definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Rather, it conjures up a quiet and dutiful domesticity.
sentences.chinese: 但這幅畫營造出一種安靜祥和且各司其職的家庭生活。

sentences.english: The war is resolved, the phoenix is a bird of harmony.
sentences.chinese: 又是對戰爭的化解，鳳凰是祥和之鳥。

sentences.english: I’m sitting up in bed, reading, when the peace and quiet come to a sudden end.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在牀上看着書，一派祥和靜謐。

sentences.english: Lotus Fairy Lake in cross-strait people live under the care of a happy and peaceful life.
sentences.chinese: 湖兩岸百姓在蓮花仙子的呵護下過着美滿祥和的生活。

sentences.english: May the aroma of books seep into our lives, and thereby changes cruelty and violence into peace and gentleness.
sentences.chinese: 讓書香化爲生命的馨香，讓暴戾兇殘化爲祥和溫柔。

sentences.english: Sky blue and white mix each other , showing quiet and peaceful .
sentences.chinese: 湖藍與白色的搭配，寧靜祥和。

sentences.english: Rich state, simple and honest, giving and peaceful atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 富態，憨厚，給人以祥和的氣氛。

sentences.english: Today, in an auspicious and cheerful atmosphere, the Two Sessions concluded successfully.
sentences.chinese: 就在今天，兩會在一片祥和歡快的氣氛裏圓滿閉幕了。

sentences.english: I can find peaceness, harmony and warmness.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，我可以找到平靜，祥和，和溫暖。

sentences.english: The place has a gracious air of faded grandeur.
sentences.chinese: 該地以祥和的氣氛取代了逐漸消退的莊嚴。

sentences.english: The lucky clouds, also used on the Beijing Olympic torch, signify auspiciousness in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 詳雲也採用了奧運火炬圖形，標誌着中華祥和的文化。

sentences.english: If you want to revisit and harmony, so apparently burning, sweeping the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 如果想重溫祥和，就得淨手焚香，灑掃庭院。

sentences.english: Warmness is the most peaceful and quietest part in one's heart.
sentences.chinese: 溫暖就是每個人心裏最安寧祥和的部分。

sentences.english: Here is the harmonious paradise for game players.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是一個充滿祥和氣氛的玩家樂園。

sentences.english: The landscape is good, quiet, clean, and peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 風景上好，安謐，清新，又祥和。

sentences.english: Ashan is a quiet, peaceful city, known also as "the Pearl of the Northeast".
sentences.chinese: 鞍山被稱爲“東北明珠”，是一個寧靜而祥和的城市。

definition: Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
Pinghe county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
